projects.goal: Control every toll-road leading into the capital.

consequences.on_fill: Syndicate taxes all traffic; prices rise and Assembly clinics feel the strain.
player_facing: Increased travel costs until the project is rolled back
Syndicate enforcers demand papers at bridges (disadvantage on stealthy travel)

projects.goal: Cleanse the blighted grove and rebind its guardian spirit.

consequences.on_fill: Safe trails open and the Circle offers fast travel and herbal aid.
player_facing: Temporary safe passage through forest encounters
Access to potent salves (advantage on the next three healing checks)

projects.goal: Silence informants before the Assembly lantern-keepers expose their network.

consequences.on_fill: Cartel vanishes into the alleys, making rumor-gathering far harder.
player_facing: Rumor checks suffer -2 until the lockdown eases
Cartel agents shadow the party (log [faction:update] if confronted)

projects.goal: Spread lantern schools to every village within a fortnight's travel.

consequences.on_fill: Hope blossoms; despairing NPCs rally and offer resources to heroes.
player_facing: Advantage on morale checks in Assembly settlements
Pilgrim routes become secure (fewer hostile encounters)

advancement_rules.downtime: During downtime, advance one relevant clock by 1 segment if the party invests time/resources.
advancement_rules.fail_forward: On failures that complicate the situation, fill rival clocks instead of halting play.
advancement_rules.scene_tags: Every impactful scene should log clock changes with [faction:update] and [timeline:advance].
